revised_title: Researches on the Structure, Organization, and Classification of Fossil Reptilia: Part IX, Section 3, On Diademodon
tldr: The author examines the structure, organization, and classification of the fossil reptile Diademodon, focusing on its unique molar teeth with quadrate, tuberculate crowns. The research provides insights into the evolutionary relationships between mammals and reptiles, as well as the classification of Diademodon within the Gomphodontia group.
